com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle

Interface MessageBundleProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMessageBundleProvider

    public interface MessageBundleProvider
    Privides MessageBundle by name. Name of message bundle is like following: 'com.jcatalog.bundleName'.
    Author:
    Roman Denisyuk

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBundle getMessageBundle(java.lang.String bundleName, java.util.Locale locale)
      Returns message MessageBundle implementation by it name and for specified locale.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageBundle

        MessageBundle getMessageBundle(java.lang.String bundleName,
                             java.util.Locale locale)
        Returns message MessageBundle implementation by it name and for specified locale.
        Parameters:
        bundleName - name of a message bundle for example: 'com.jcatalog.bundleName'
        locale - should be used for getting message bundle file with requested translations.
        Returns:
        MessageBundle. Message bundle with specified name should be exist.
